name: Football Showdown
description:
• TOP 10 APP •

Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone in the world in a head-to-head Football Showdown!

• COMPETE FOR GLORY •
Win prizes in online tournaments or compete in single player seasons as your favorite team. Then put your winnings to use by unlocking unique footballs and upgrades.

• IT'S ALL ABOUT FAME •
Beat down opponents with your skills AND your popularity. Add friends to earn rewards and steal experience points from your opponents!

• A SPECTACULAR NEXT-GEN EXPERIENCE •
Hyper-realistic graphics and heart pounding multiplayer action drop you right on the gridiron.

• THE APP IS UP...AND IT'S GOOD •
"The most addictive football game to ever grace the App Store" - FreeAppsArcade
"Get a kick out of beating your friends" - AppAdvice

• JOIN OVER 50 MILLION GAMERS WORLDWIDE •
And find out why Naquatic apps like Guncrafter and Shooting Showdown have lit up the top charts and been featured by everyone from Apple to Google, Amazon, IGN, Microsoft, AppAdvice, and TouchArcade.

100 YARDS WORTH OF FEATURES
• Season, Playoff, and Exhibition game modes
• Unlockable balls and upgrades to boost your skillz
• Unique trophies and bonuses for completing achievements
• The exclusive PhysKick™ engine for unparalleled control
• Full set of achievements and leaderboards
